sprint_goal: Establish the foundational UI and a complete, secure user registration flow.
Implement the core login and email verification loop, enabling user access to the platform.
Complete the authentication lifecycle with a secure logout and a full password recovery flow.
Enhance account security with MFA and build the foundational basic profile editing capabilities.
Build out the core profile sections for Work Experience and Education, including add/edit functionality and validation.
Implement profile personalization with image uploads and custom URLs, and establish the critical profile privacy controls.

title: Remove a Work Experience Entry from Profile
description: As a Profile Owner, I want to permanently remove a specific work experience entry from my profile, so that I can ensure my professional history is accurate and up-to-date.
business_value: Provides users with full control over their professional data, enhancing data accuracy and building user trust.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"User confirms the deletion","given":"the deletion confirmation modal is open","when":"I click the 'Confirm' button","then":"the work experience entry is removed from the UI without a page reload, and a success toast notification 'Work experience removed' is displayed."},{"scenario":"Security: User attempts to delete another user's experience entry","given":"I am logged in as User A","when":"I attempt to send a direct API request to delete a work experience entry belonging to User B","then":"the server rejects the request with a 403 Forbidden status code and the data is not deleted."}]
definition_of_done: ["All acceptance criteria validated and passing.","Integration tests are written to confirm atomic deletion from the database and search index.","E2E tests for the happy path and cancellation flow are passing.","UI is verified to be responsive and meets accessibility standards."]

title: Remove an Education Entry from Profile
description: As a registered user, I want to permanently remove an individual education entry, so that I can keep my profile accurate and relevant.
business_value: Enhances user trust and satisfaction by providing full control over personal data and improves overall data quality on the platform.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successful removal of an education entry","given":"I am a logged-in user on my profile's 'Edit Profile' page with an education entry","when":"I click the 'Remove' icon next to an entry and confirm in the dialog","then":"The entry is permanently deleted from the database and removed from the UI without a page reload."},{"scenario":"Unauthorized attempt to remove an entry","given":"A user is logged in","when":"They attempt to send a direct API request to delete an education entry belonging to another user","then":"The backend must reject the request with a '403 Forbidden' status code."}]
definition_of_done: ["All acceptance criteria validated and passing.","Integration tests for the API endpoint and service layer are passing.","E2E tests covering the happy path and cancellation flow are passing.","Security check confirms that a user cannot delete another user's data."]

title: Add Skills to Profile
description: As a professional managing my profile, I want to add a list of my skills, so that I can showcase my expertise and improve my profile's discoverability.
business_value: Enriches user profiles, providing critical data for search functionality and future features like job matching.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successfully add a new, unique skill","given":"I am a logged-in user on my profile's 'edit' page","when":"I enter a valid, new skill (e.g., 'GraphQL') into the skill input field and confirm","then":"The skill 'GraphQL' is added to my profile and displayed in my list of skills."},{"scenario":"Attempt to add a duplicate skill","given":"I already have the skill 'PostgreSQL' in my skills list","when":"I enter 'PostgreSQL' (case-insensitively) and attempt to add it","then":"The skill is not added, and an error message 'This skill has already been added' is displayed."}]
definition_of_done: ["All acceptance criteria validated and passing.","End-to-end tests covering the happy path and key error conditions are passing.","Input sanitization has been verified to prevent XSS.","The asynchronous update to the OpenSearch index is confirmed to be working reliably."]

title: Remove Skills from Profile
description: As a professional user, I want to remove individual skills from my skills list, so that I can ensure my profile accurately reflects my current expertise.
business_value: Enhances profile data integrity and user satisfaction by allowing users to maintain an accurate representation of their abilities.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successfully removing a skill from the profile","given":"I am a logged-in user on my own profile page in 'edit' mode","when":"I click the 'remove' icon next to a skill in my skills list","then":"The skill is immediately removed from the list in the UI without a page reload, and any associated endorsements are also deleted."},{"scenario":"Unauthorized attempt to remove a skill from another user's profile","given":"I am logged in as User A","when":"I attempt to make a direct API call to delete a skill from User B's profile","then":"The API request is rejected with a '403 Forbidden' status code."}]
definition_of_done: ["All acceptance criteria validated and passing.","Integration tests implemented to verify the transactional deletion of skills and endorsements.","E2E tests passing for the user flow.","Security requirements (authorization) validated."]

sprint_goal: Implement profile viewing logic based on privacy and connection status, and complete profile management with delete functionality for Experience, Education, and Skills.
Build the complete connection request workflow: sending, viewing, accepting, and declining invitations.
Implement connection management features, including viewing, sorting, and removing connections, and add skill endorsements.
Launch the core content creation and consumption experience by implementing the personalized news feed and the ability to create posts with text, images, and link previews.
Build out content interaction features: editing/deleting posts, adding/removing reactions, commenting, and reporting inappropriate content.
Launch the foundational direct messaging MVP, allowing users to initiate conversations, send messages, and view history.
Enhance the messaging experience with real-time indicators and implement the foundational user search functionality.
Deliver a complete advanced search experience with fuzzy matching, connection ranking, privacy enforcement, and multiple filters.
Implement the core real-time notification system, enabling users to receive alerts for key interactions and view them in a notification center.
Refine the notification system with batching and user preferences, and implement the account deactivation/reactivation lifecycle.
Finalize critical user account and privacy management features, including the Privacy Dashboard, data export, permanent deletion, security audit trail, and Help Center.
